hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.prisonterm.report.PrisonTermSummary( prisonTerm.id, offender.id, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.middleName, offenderName.suffix, offender.offenderNumber, prisonTerm.actionDate, prisonTerm.preSentenceCredits, prisonTerm.sentenceDate, prisonTerm.sentenceTermYears, prisonTerm.sentenceTermDays, prisonTerm.paroleEligibilityDate, prisonTerm.projectedDischargeDate, prisonTerm.maximumDischargeDate, prisonTerm.sentenceToFollow, prisonTerm.comments, prisonTerm.status, verificationName.lastName, verificationName.firstName, verificationName.middleName, verificationUser.username, prisonTerm.verificationDate, sentenceCalculation.id ) from omis.prisonterm.domain.PrisonTerm as prisonTerm left outer join prisonTerm.sentenceCalculation sentenceCalculation inner join prisonTerm.offender as offender inner join offender.name as offenderName left join prisonTerm.verificationUser as verificationUser left join verificationUser.user as user left join user.name as verificationName where prisonTerm.offender = :offender order by prisonTerm.actionDate desc

select new omis.prisonterm.report.PrisonTermSummary( prisonTerm.id, offender.id, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.middleName, offenderName.suffix, offender.offenderNumber, prisonTerm.actionDate, prisonTerm.preSentenceCredits, prisonTerm.sentenceDate, prisonTerm.sentenceTermYears, prisonTerm.sentenceTermDays, prisonTerm.paroleEligibilityDate, prisonTerm.projectedDischargeDate, prisonTerm.maximumDischargeDate, prisonTerm.sentenceToFollow, prisonTerm.comments, prisonTerm.status, verificationName.lastName, verificationName.firstName, verificationName.middleName, verificationUser.username, prisonTerm.verificationDate, sentenceCalculation.id ) from omis.prisonterm.domain.PrisonTerm prisonTerm left outer join prisonTerm.sentenceCalculation sentenceCalculation inner join prisonTerm.offender offender inner join offender.name as offenderName left join prisonTerm.verificationUser as verificationUser left join verificationUser.user as user left join user.name as verificationName where prisonTerm.offender = :offender and (prisonTerm.verificationUser is not null and prisonTerm.verificationDate is not null) and prisonTerm.status is 'ACTIVE'
